pullRequest.title: agility: Add config for Sepulchre obstacles and skill obstacles
pullRequest.bodyText:
This commit moves the Sepulchre obstacles from COURSE_OBSTACLE_IDS into its own set so it can be more easily toggled. Also adds config to optionally enable highlighting of the skill obstacles, which also now has its own set. Sepulchre Highlight has been renamed Projectile Color as to not be confusing with the newly added configs as they get their color from Overlay Color.  The other sepulchre configs have been renamed to prevent redundancy and were added to a new sepulchreSection at the bottom of AgilityConfig.

Skill challenge highlights:

nodes.bodyText: Maybe add a "Hallowed Sepulchre" config section since "Projectile Color" on its own doesn't really mean anything in this plugin, and having four sepulchre configs is starting to get a bit busy at the bottom of this config.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -234,12 +234,34 @@ default boolean highlightSepulchreNpcs()
 
 	@ConfigItem(
 		keyName = "sepulchreHighlightColor",
-		name = "Sepulchre Highlight",
+		name = "Projectile Color",

beforeCommit.message:
agility: Add config for Sepulchre obstacles and skill obstacles

This commit moves the Sepulchre obstacles from `COURSE_OBSTACLE_IDS` into its own set so it can be toggled. Also adds config to optionally enable highlighting of the skill obstacles, which also now has its own set. `Sepulchre Highlight` has been renamed `Projectile Color` as to not be confusing with the newly added configs.

nodes.bodyText:

        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            		name = "Hallowed Sepulchre",

commit.message:
agility: Add config for Sepulchre obstacles and skill obstacles

This commit moves Sepulchre obstacle IDs into a separate set so their
highlighting can be toggled separately. It also adds a toggle to
highlight Sepulchre skill obstacles.
agility: Add Hallowed Sepulchre config section
